Title: Harbor Town Square
Description:
Crates as altars to trade; gulls as choirboys. The square is a knot of shouting, salt, and steam.

Refugees huddle around borrowed pots. Elven factors argue under lacquered awnings while militia watch from the bridge.

Options.Text: Keep an eye on your purse.
